full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,GAR DBANG GSANG BA YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO'I BSKANG BSHAGS RGYAS 'BRING GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHONG SOGS ZHI BA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR LANG SNYIGS MAR SPYOD PA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LHOD KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG PO DANG, LHAG PAR LA SNGA PHYIR NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MA MO  'DRA BA MANG DU 'CHED CING, MI SHIS PA'I LTAS DAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I KHU LDOG GI NI RNAMS PA YIN PA DANG, BSKANGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTAD NA, ,LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR PA BZHIN, LAG LEN DU BSTAR SKABS, ^ BTZUN PA GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN GYI RDO RJE'I GSUNGS LA TSIG CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, ,LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, ,DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU KLAG CHOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,'DI GNYAN BAS, GAR THOD THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG BAS SNOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O, ,)
